Class ReviewManager

java.lang.Object
application.ReviewManager
public class ReviewManager extends Object
Acts as a manager class for dealing with Review objects. This use of data hiding and encapsulation helps ensure parity between data stored in the local cache and data stored on the MySQL database.

    • createNewQuestionReview

      public Review createNewQuestionReview(String userName, LocalDateTime creationDate, String content, int rating, Question question)
      Creates a new Review for a Question before inserting it into the Reviews table and local cache.
      Parameters:
      userName - Name of reviewer
      creationDate - When the review was created
      content - Review content
      rating - Rating value (1-5)
      question - Question being reviewed
      Returns:
      new Review object

    • createNewAnswerReview
